/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Trees line the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene.
